eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A 911 TELEPHONE OUTAGE EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Tensas, LA; AT 12:35 PM ON SEP 25, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 07:35 AM SEP 26, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
Tensas Parish 911 lines are down.  There is a major loss of communication in Louisiana and Mississippi due to transmission lines cut. For EMERGENCIES contact
318-766-3961
318-766-3376
318-301-5008
318-301-5012
For Ambulance contact 318-435-4000
